title: Baltimore Mayor on His Advice to NY's Mamdani
description: Brandon Scott, Mayor of Baltimore, discusses housing affordability and shares his advice for New York’s mayor-elect Mamdani. He tells Romaine Bostick on “The Close” that Mamdani needs to lead with people and build the best team. (Source: Bloomberg)
